document.masterDocTitle: Oribatid mites (Acari: Oribatida) recorded from Ireland: Catalogue, historical records, species habitats and geographical distribution, combinations, variations and synonyms

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Oribatid mites (Acari: Oribatida) recorded from Ireland: Catalogue, historical records, species habitats and geographical distribution, combinations, variations and synonyms

subSubSection.paragraph:
·
Brachychthonius berlesei Willmann, 1928

· Original name:
Brachychthonius berlesei Willmann, 1928
.

· In: Die Oribatidenfauna nordwestdeutscher und einiger süddeutscher Moore.
Abhandlungen herausgegeben vom Naturwissenschaftlichen Verein zu Bremen
, 27, 143–176.

· Historical combinations/variations:
Brachychochthonius berlesei (Willmann) Jacot, 1938
.

· Synonyms:
Brachychthonius brevis Berlese, 1910
[misidentification];
Brachychochthonius jugatus Jacot, 1938
.

·
Brachychthonius bimaculatus Willmann, 1936
*

· Original name:
Brachychthonius bimaculatus Willmann, 1936
.
· In: Neue Acari aus schlesischen Wiesenboden. Zoologische Anzeiger, 113, 273–290.

· Historical combinations/variations:
Brachychochthonius bimaculatus (Willmann)
, Moritz, 1963.

· Synonyms:
Brachychthonius helveticus Schweizer, 1956
.

Irish Reference/s and Habitat/s : Agricultural grassland with application of animal manure ( Bolger 1980 ); agricultural grassland ( Bolger and Curry, 1984 ); dune and pasture at seashore (Purvis 1982). Counties: Wexford .

·
Brachychthonius hirtus Moritz, 1976

· Original name:
Brachychthonius hirtus Moritz, 1976
.

· In: Revision der Europäischen Gattungen und Arten der Familie Brachychthoniidae ( Acari, Oribatei ).
Mitteilungen aus dem Zoologischen Museum in Berlin
, 52, 227–319.

· Historical combinations/variations:
Brachychochthonius hirtus (Moritz) Saloña and Iturrondobeitia, 1988
. Irish Reference/s and Habitat/s : Agricultural grassland ( Piotrowska 2010 ). Counties: Cork .

·
Liochthonius alpestris (Forsslund, 1958)

· Original name:
Brachychthonius alpestris Forsslund, 1958
.
· In: Notizen über Oribatei ( Acari ). II. Entomologisk Tidskrift , 79, 75–86.

· Historical combinations/variations:
Liochthonius ( Liochthonius ) alpestris (Forsslund) Subías 2004
. Irish Reference/s and Habitat/s : Soil in Norway spruce forest ( Heneghan 1994 ). Counties: Kilkenny.

·
Liochthonius brevis (Michael, 1888)
*

· Original name:
Hypochthonius brevis Michael, 1888
.

· In:
British Oribatidae
. Vols. I and II. Ray Soc., London. 656 pp.

· Historical combinations/variations:
Brachychthonius brevis (Michael) Jacot, 1938
;
Liochthonius ( Liochthonius ) brevis (Michael) Subías, 2004
.

· Synonyms:
Brachychthonius perpusillus Berlese, 1910
;
Brachychthonius latus Jacot, 1936
;
Liochthonius perpusillus (Berlese) van der Hammen, 1959
.

Irish Reference/s and Habitat/s :
Sphagnum
and other mosses ( Halbert 1915 ); agricultural grassland (Curry 1976, 1979); dune, gorse bank and bracken bed (Purvis 1982);
Salix
litter on cutaway bog (unpublished data); woodland soil (unpublished data); fungal sporocarps ( O’Connell 1994 ), soil in Norway spruce forest ( Heneghan 1994 ; Heneghan and Bolger 1996 ), soil and moss on soil in Sitka spruce forest ( Arroyo and Bolger 2007 ); moss in canopy of Sitka spruce forest (
Arroyo et al . 2009b
); moss on soil in Sitka spruce forests (
Arroyo et al . 2012
, 2013b ).

materialsCitation.stateProvince: Dublin, Kildare, Kilkenny, Laois, Mayo, Meath, Offaly, Wexford and Wicklow

paragraph.materialsCitation: Counties: Dublin, Kildare, Kilkenny, Laois, Mayo, Meath, Offaly, Wexford and Wicklow .

subSubSection.paragraph:
·
Liochthonius evansi (Forsslund, 1958)

· Original name:
Brachychthonius evansi Forsslund, 1958
.
· In: Notizen über Oribatei ( Acari ). II. Entomologisk Tidskrift , 79, 75–86.

· Historical combinations/variations:
Liochtonius ( Liochthonius ) evansi (Forsslund) Subías, 2004
.

paragraph.materialsCitation: Irish Reference/s and Habitat/s : Fungal sporocarps ( O’Connell 1994 ). Counties: Kilkenny .

subSubSection.paragraph:
·
Liochthonius horridus (Sellnick, 1928)
*

· Original name:
Brachychthonius horridus Sellnick, 1928
.
· In: Formenkreis: Hornmilben, Oribatei. Die Tierwelt Mitteleuropas, 3, 4 (IX), 1–42.

· Historical combinations/variations:
Liochthoinius horridus
[sic] (Sellnick) Mahunka 1969;
Liochthonius ( Liochthonius ) horridus (Sellnick) Subías, 2004
.

· Synonyms:
Brachychthonius gisini Strenzke, 1951
.

paragraph.materialsCitation:
Counties:
Dublin, Kildare Kilkenny , Mayo and Wexford
.

subSubSection.paragraph:
·
Liochthonius hystricinus (Forsslund, 1942)
*

· Original name:
Brachychthonius hystricinus Forsslund, 1942
.
· In: Schwedische Oribatei ( Acari ) I. Arkiv fÖr zoologi, 34A (10), 1–11.

· Historical combinations/variations:
Liochthonius ( Liochthonius ) hystricinus (Forsslund) Subías, 2004
;
Liochthonius hystricinum
[sic] (Forsslund)
Arroyo et al ., 2009b
.

· Synonyms:
Brachychthonius ocellatus Hammer, 1952
.

·
Liochchthonius laetepictus (Berlese, 1910)
sp.inq.

· Original name:
Brachychthonius laetepictus Berlese, 1910
.
· In: Βrevi diagnosi di generi e specie nuovi di Acari . Ibid. , (6), 346–388.

· Historical combinations/variations:
Liochthonius ( Liochthonius ) laetepictus (Berlese) Subías, 2004

· Synonyms:
Eobrachychthonius oudemansi (van der Hammen) Miko, 2016
. Irish Reference/s and Habitat/s : Fungal sporocarps ( O’Connell 1994 ). Counties: Kilkenny .

·
Liochthonius lapponicus (Trägårdh, 1910)
*

· Original name:
Hypochthonius brevis lapponicus Trägårdh, 1910
.
· In: Acariden aus dem Sarekgebirge. Naturwiss. Untersuch. Sarekgebirges Schwedisch-Lappland, 4, 375–586.

· Historical combinations/variations:
Brachychthonius lapponica (Trägårdh) Strenzke, 1951
;
Liochthonius ( Liochthonius ) lapponicus (Trägårdh) Subías, 2004
.

· Synonyms:
Liochthonius perpusillus sensu Pérez-Ínigo, 1968
no Berlese, 1910. Irish Reference/s and Habitat/s : Pasture and gorse bank at seashore (Purvis 1982). Counties : Wexford .

·
Liochthonius leptaleus Moritz, 1976
*

· Original name:
Liochthonius leptaleus Moritz, 1976
.

· In: Revision der europäischen Gattungen und Arten der Familie Brachychthoniidae ( Acari, Oribatei ) Teil 1. Allgemeiner Teil: Brachychthoniidae Thor, 1934 . spezieller Teil: Liochthonius v. d. Hammen, 1959, Verachthonius nov. gen. und Paraliochthonius nov. gen.
Mitteilungen aus dem Zoologischen Museum an der Humboldt-Universität zu Berlin
, 52, 27–136.

· Historical combinations/variations:
Liochthonius ( Liochthonius ) leptaleus (Moritz) Subías, 2004 Irish
Reference/s and Habitat/s : Dune and pasture at seashore (Purvis 1982);
Salix
litter on a cutaway bog (unpublished data).

·
Liochthonius muscorum Forsslund, 1964
*

· Original name:
Liochthonius muscorum Forsslund, 1964
.

· In:
Liochthonius muscorum
n.sp. und
L. lapponicus (Träg.)
( Acari, Oribatei ). Entomologisk Tidskrift , 85, 238– 238.

· Historical combinations/variations:
Liochthonius ( Liochthonius) muscorum (Forsslund) Subías, 2004 Irish
Reference/s and Habitat/s : Pasture (Purvis 1982); Norway spruce forest ( Heneghan 1994 ); moss on soil surface in Sitka spruce forest ( Arroyo and Bolger, 2007 ).

·
Liochthonius perfusorius Moritz, 1976

· Original name:
Liochthonius perfusorius Moritz, 1976
.

· In: Revision der Europaischen Gattungen und Arten der Familie Brachychthoniidae ( Acari, Oribatei ). Teil I. -
Mitteilungen aus dem Zoologischen Museum in Berlin
, 52, 27–136.

· Historical combinations/variations:
Liochthonius ( Liochthonius ) perfusorius (Moritz) Subías, 2004
Irish Reference/s and Habitat/s : Soil and moss on soil surface in Sitka spruce forest ( Arroyo and Bolger, 2007 )

·
Liochthonius sellnicki (Thor, 1930)
*

· Original name:
Brachychthonius sellnicki Thor, 1930
.

· In: Beiträge zur Kenntnis der Invertebraten Fauna von Svalbard
.
Skrifter om Svalbard og Ishavet, Oslo ,
27, 1–

· Historical combinations/variations:
Liochthonius ( Liochthonius ) sellnicki (Thor) Subías, 2004
.

· Synonyms:
Brachychthonius brevis expolitus Berlese, 1910
“sp. inq.”;
Brachychthonius scalaris Forsslund
,

subSubSection.paragraph:
·
Liochthonius simplex (Forsslund, 1942)
*

· Original name:
Brachychthonius simplex Forsslund, 1942
.
· In: Schwedische Oribatei ( Acari ). I. Arkiv fÖr zoologi , 34A (10), 1–11.

· Historical combinations/variations:
Liochthonius ( Liochthonius ) simplex (Forsslund) Subías, 2004
.

·
Neoliochthonius piluliferus (Forsslund, 1942)
*

· Original name:
Brachychthonius piluliferus Forsslund, 1942
.
· In: Schwedische Oribatei ( Acari ). I. Arkiv fÖr zoologi , 34A (10), 1–11.

Irish Reference/s and Habitat/s : Agricultural grassland (Curry 1976); dune, pasture, gorse bank, bracken bed and
Salix
ditch at seashore (Purvis 1982); woodland soil (unpublished data). Counties: Dublin, Kilkenny and Wexford.

·
Sellnickochthonius cricoides (Weis-Fogh, 1948)
* · Original name:
Brachychthonius cricoides Weis-Fogh, 1948
.
· In: Ecological investigation on mites and Collemboles in the soil. Appendix: Description of some new mites
( Acari ). Natura Jutlandica, 1, 135–270.

Irish Reference/s and Habitat/s : Agricultural grassland ( Curry 1969a ); cutaway raised bog and permanent pasture on peat ( Whelan 1976 ); dune,
Iris bog
and gorse bank at seashore (Purvis 1982); fungal sporocarps ( O’Connell 1994 ).

·
Sellnickochthonius furcatus (Weis-Fogh, 1948)
*

· Original name:
Brachychthonius furcatus Weis-Fogh, 1948
.
· In: Ecological investigation on mites and Collemboles in the soil. Appendix: Description of some new mites ( Acari ). Natura Jutlandica, 1, 135–270.

· Historical combinations/variations:
Brachychochthonius furcatus (Weis-Fogh) Balogh and Mahunka, 1983
. Irish Reference/s and Habitat/s : Cutaway raised bog and permanent pasture on peat ( Whelan 1976 ); soil in sugar beet field ( Breslin 1979 ); agricultural grassland ( Bolger 1980 ); soil in Norway spruce forest ( Heneghan 1994 ; Heneghan and Bolger 1996 ).

paragraph.materialsCitation: Counties: Carlow, Kildare, Kilkenny and Wexford .

subSubSection.paragraph:
·
Sellnickochthonius honestus (Moritz, 1976)

· Original name:
Brachychochthonius honestus Moritz, 1976
.

· In: Revision der europäischen Gattungen und Arten der Familie Brachychochthoniidae ( Acari, Oribatei ) Teil 2. Mixochthonius Niedbała, 1972 , Neobrachychthonius nov. gen, Synochthonius v. d. Hammen, 1952, Poecilochthonius Balogh, 1943 , Brachychthonius Berlese, 1910 , Brachychochthonius Jacot, 1938 .
Mitteilungen aus dem Zoologischen Museum an der Humboldt-Universität zu Berlin
, 52, 227–319. · Synonyms:
Brachychthonius zelawaiensis
; Evans 1952 [misidentification];
Brachychthonius zelawaiensis
; BulanovaZachvatkina 1957 [misidentification].
Irish Reference/s and Habitat/s : Soil in Norway spruce forest ( Heneghan 1994 ).

·
Sellnickochthonius hungaricus (Balogh, 1943)
*

· Original name:
Poecilochthonius hungaricus Balogh, 1943
.
· In: Magyarország páncélosatkái. (Conspectus Oribateorum Hungariae). Matematikai és Természettudományi KÖzlemények, 38 (5), 1– 202.

Irish Reference/s and Habitat/s : Dune, pasture and
Salix
ditch at seashore (Purvis 1982);
Salix
litter on cutaway bog ( Bolger 1985 ).

·
Sellnickochthonius immaculatus (Forsslund, 1942)
*

· Original name:
Brachychochthonius immaculatus Forsslund, 1942
.
· In: Schwedische Oribatei ( Acari ) I. Arkiv fÖr zoologi , 34 A (10), 1–11.

· Historical combinations/variations:
Brachychthonius immaculatus (Forsslund) Jacot, 1937
.

·
Sellnickochthonius jacoti (Evans, 1952)
*

· Original name:
Brachychthonius jacoti Evans, 1952
.

· In: British mites of the genus
Brachychthonius Berl., 1910
. Annals and Magazine of Natural History , London , 5, 227–239.
Irish Reference/s and Habitat/s : Dune, pasture and gorse bank at seashore (Purvis 1982) soil from Norway spruce forest ( Heneghan 1994 ; Heneghan and Bolger 1996 ). Counties : Kilkenny and Wexford.

·
Sellnickochthonius oesziae (Balogh and Mahunka, 1979)

· Original name:
Brachychochthonius oesziae Balogh and Mahunka, 1979
.
· In: New taxa in the system of the Oribatida ( Acari ). Annales historico-naturales Musei Nationalis Hungarici , 71,279–290.

paragraph.materialsCitation: Irish Reference/s and Habitat/s : Fungal sporocarps ( O’Connell 1994 ). Counties: Kilkenny .

subSubSection.paragraph:
·
Sellnickochthonius suecicus (Forsslund, 1942)
*

· Original name:
Brachychochthonius jugatus suecicus Forsslund, 1942
.
· In: Schwedische Oribatei ( Acari ). I. Arkiv fÖr zoologi , 34 A (10), 1–11.

· Synonyms:
Brachychthonius jugatus sensu Niedbala, 1972
no Jacot, 1938.

Irish Reference/s and Habitat/s : Dune, pastures gorse bank and
Salix
ditch at seashore (Purvis 1982). Counties: Wexford .

·
Sellnickochthonius zelawaiensis (Sellnick, 1928)
*

· Original name:
Brachychthonius zelawaiensis Sellnick, 1928
.
· In: Formenkreis: Hornmilben, Oribatei. Die Tierwelt Mitteleuropas 3, 4 (IX), 1–42.

· Historical combinations/variations:
Brachychochthonius zelawaiensis (Sellnick) Jacot, 1938
;
Sellnickochthonius zelawaiensis (Sellnick) Krivolutsky, 1964
.

Irish Reference/s and Habitat/s : Cutaway raised bog and permanent pasture on bog ( Longworth 1973 ; Whelan 1976 ); agricultural grassland (Curry 1976); soil in Norway spruce forest ( Heneghan 1994 ); fungal sporocarps ( O’Connell 1994 ; unpublished data); moss on soil in Sitka spruce forests (
Arroyo et al . 2012
, 2013b ).

materialsCitation.stateProvince: Dublin, Kildare, Kilkenny, Mayo and Wicklow

subSubSection.paragraph:
·
Synchthonius elegans Forsslund, 1957

· Original name:
Synchthonius elegans Forsslund, 1957
.
· In: Schwedische Oribatei ( Acari ). III. Entomologisk Tidskrift, 77 (2–4), 210–218. Irish Reference/s and Habitat/s : Fungal sporocarps ( O’Connell 1994 ). Counties : Kilkenny .
